participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

resp_wheeze_yn_y.Description: Have you ever had wheezing or whistling in the chest at any time in the past? | 1 = Yes;  0 = No;  999 = Don't know

resp_wheeze_age_y.Description: If you aren't sure of the age, can you recall if it was... | 0 = Before 5 years old (before elementary school);  1 = Between 5-12 years old (in elementary or middle school);  2 = Between 13-18 years old (in middle school or high school);  3 = After 18 years old (after high school)

Levels.1: Between 5-12 years old (in elementary or middle school)
Levels.2: Between 13-18 years old (in middle school or high school)

resp_current_yn_y.Description: Have you had wheezing or whistling in the chest in the past 12 months? | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_wheeze_tally_y.Description: How many attacks of wheezing have you had in the past 12 months? | 0 = None;  1 = 1;  2 = 2;  3 = 3;  4 = 4-12;  5 = More than 12

resp_wheeze_sleep_y.Description: In the past 12 months, how often, on average, has your sleep been disturbed due to wheezing? | 0 = Never woken with wheezing;  1 = Less than one time per week;  2 = One or more times per week

Levels.1: Less than one time per week
Levels.2: One or more times per week

resp_wheeze_speech_yn_y.Description: In the past 12 months, has wheezing ever been severe enough to limit your speech to only one or two words at a time between breaths? | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_wheeze_active_y.Description: During the past 12 months, how much did you limit your usual activities due to wheezing or whistling? Would you say... | 0 = Not at all;  1 = A little;  2 = A fair amount;  3 = A moderate amount;  4 = A lot

resp_wheeze_abs_y.Description: During the past 12 months, how many days of school did you miss due to wheezing or whistling? | 0 = None;  1 = 1 to 2;  2 = 3 or more

resp_wheeze_trig4_y.Description: Other Animals | 1 = Yes;  0 = No;  999 = Don't know

resp_wheeze_trig6_y.Description: Dusty Places | 1 = Yes;  0 = No;  999 = Don't know

resp_wheeze_trig7_y.Description: Moldy Places | 1 = Yes;  0 = No;  999 = Don't know

resp_wheeze_trig8_y.Description: Cigarette or Cigar smoke | 1 = Yes;  0 = No;  999 = Don't know

resp_wheeze_trig9_y.Description: Vaping or E-Cigarettes | 1 = Yes;  0 = No;  999 = Don't know

resp_wheeze_trig10_y.Description: Strong Odors | 1 = Yes;  0 = No;  999 = Don't know

resp_wheeze_trig11_y.Description: Indoor wood smoke (fireplaces, wood stoves, etc..) | 1 = Yes;  0 = No;  999 = Don't know

resp_wheeze_trig12_y.Description: Outdoor wood smoke (BBQs, campfires, etc...) | 1 = Yes;  0 = No;  999 = Don't know

resp_wheeze_trig14_y.Description: Weather changes | 1 = Yes;  0 = No;  999 = Don't know

resp_wheeze_trig15_y.Description: Cold air | 1 = Yes;  0 = No;  999 = Don't know

resp_wheeze_trig17_y.Description: Common cold or sinus infection | 1 = Yes;  0 = No;  999 = Don't know

resp_others_y.Description: Please specify what other animals sets off or triggers any of your wheezing or whistling symptoms

resp_otherspec_y.Description: Please specify what food sets off or triggers any of your wheezing or whistling symptoms

resp_exercise_yn_y.Description: In the past 12 months, has your chest sounded wheezy during or after exercise? | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_pmcough_yn_y.Description: In the past 12 months, have you had a dry cough at night, apart from a cough associated with a cold or chest infection? | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_pmcough_month_y___1.Description: In which of these past month(s) did this cough occur? [check all that apply]: January | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_pmcough_month_y___2.Description: In which of these past month(s) did this cough occur? [check all that apply]: February | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_pmcough_month_y___3.Description: In which of these past month(s) did this cough occur? [check all that apply]: March | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_pmcough_month_y___4.Description: In which of these past month(s) did this cough occur? [check all that apply]: April | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_pmcough_month_y___5.Description: In which of these past month(s) did this cough occur? [check all that apply]: May | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_pmcough_month_y___6.Description: In which of these past month(s) did this cough occur? [check all that apply]: June | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_pmcough_month_y___7.Description: In which of these past month(s) did this cough occur? [check all that apply]: July | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_pmcough_month_y___8.Description: In which of these past month(s) did this cough occur? [check all that apply]: August | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_pmcough_month_y___9.Description: In which of these past month(s) did this cough occur? [check all that apply]: September | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_pmcough_month_y___10.Description: In which of these past month(s) did this cough occur? [check all that apply]: October | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_pmcough_month_y___11.Description: In which of these past month(s) did this cough occur? [check all that apply]: November | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_pmcough_month_y___12.Description: In which of these past month(s) did this cough occur? [check all that apply]: December | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_diagnosis_yn_y.Description: Has a doctor or other healthcare provider ever diagnosed you with asthma? | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_diagnosis_y.Description: If you aren't sure of the age can you recall if it was... | 0 = Before 5 years old (before elementary school);  1 = Between 5-12 years old (in elementary or middle school);  2 = Between 13-18 years old (in middle or highschool);  3 = After 18 years old (after high school)

Levels.1: Between 5-12 years old (in elementary or middle school)
Levels.2: Between 13-18 years old (in middle or highschool)

resp_asthma_yn_y.Description: Do you still have asthma? | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_asthma_hosp_yn_y.Description: Have you ever been hospitalized overnight for asthma or a severe episode of wheezing or whistling in the chest at any time in the past? [Do not include emergency room visits] | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_asthma_hosp_y.Description: How many times have you been hospitalized overnight for asthma or a severe episode of wheezing or whistling in the chest? [Do not include emergency room visits] | 0 = None;  1 = 1-2;  2 = 3-5;  3 = 6 or more

resp_recent_hosp_y.Description:
In the past 12 months, have you been hospitalized overnight for asthma or a severe episode of
 wheezing or whistling in the chest? [Do not include emergency room visits] | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_urgentcare_yn_y.Description: In the past 12 months, have you had to visit an emergency room or urgent care center because of asthma or a severe episode of wheezing or whistling in the chest? | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_bronch_yn_y.Description: Have you ever been diagnosed with pneumonia or bronchitis? | 1 = Yes;  0 = No;  999 = Don't know

resp_bronch_tally_y.Description: How many times has pneumonia or bronchitis been diagnosed? | 0 = 1 time;  1 = 2-4 times;  2 = 5 or more times

resp_bronch_hosp_yn_y.Description: Have you ever been hospitalized overnight for pneumonia or bronchitis? [Do not include emergency room visits] | 1 = Yes;  0 = No

resp_bronch_hosp_y.Description: How many times have you been hospitalized for pneumonia or bronchitis? | 1 = 1 time;  2 = 2-4 times;  3 = 5 or more times
